So I've been playing for about two months, seen about 20 or so LoL articles; and seen your joke about 20 times.

I think Cloud 9 will do well, although I would have liked to see TSM go, can't deny that Cloud 9 is a strong team with great individual skill and amazing team coordination, consistently.  These should be some good games.
dont think cloud 9 will do as well without Hai being there
Oh I'm a big C9 fan but I guess missed news on Hai.. What happened?
I believe his lung collapsed. He's gonna be fine, but he's recovering from surgery.
When they took out the tubes after his first surgery, his lung collapsed again so it will be longer than expected.
Only if you guarantee me a 2-for-1 virus deal when I trade my credit info for your phishing malware.
So I've been playing for about two months, seen about 20 or so LoL articles; and seen your joke about 20 times.
So far I've been in this comment thread for 20 seconds and seen your comment twice.
Did you just copy what the person you replied to wrote a few comments above?...
It's ok I deserved that -_-
So I've been playing for about two months, seen about 20 or so LoL articles; and seen your joke about 20 times.

Honestly, this allstars seems extremely lackluster in comparison to last years. All stars is meant to have ALL STARS from EACH REGION competing on one team for each region, not the best teams. Having the best teams in a way defeats the purpose of all stars because although they work the best as a team they don't have the individual best players which is the point of all stars. Riot you really messed up on this one.

Riot did this to make the LCS spring split important. Season 3 spring didnt have any significance whatsoever. It did not effect who goes to worlds at all; making the spring split pointless. Riot implemented this system of the best team going to allstar just to make spring split somewhat important.
But they do have all the best players as well as the best teams, all-star teams are playing alongside all-star players
girl at 1:08 is hot
i was looking forward to that before i gave you the upvote, but you have not failed young one. indeed good vision you have {{item:2050}}
